Package utility

Class TimeHelper

java.lang.Object
utility.TimeHelper
public class TimeHelper extends Object
Utility class that handles various date and time matters, including conversions, lists of times in necessary data types, and comparing dates and times.

      public TimeHelper()

  • Method Details

    • hasDateSpillover

      public static boolean hasDateSpillover()
      Method that returns boolean depending on whether there is spillover into next day per user's default timezone.
      Returns:
      Returns true if 8am-10pm EST translates to midnight and later for user.

    • setDateSpillover

      public static void setDateSpillover(boolean spillover)
      Method that sets boolean depending on whether there is spillover into next day per user's default timezone.
      Parameters:
      spillover - Boolean that is true if time spills over beyond 11:59pm per user's default time zone.

    • getHoursList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Integer> getHoursList()
      Method that returns hoursList.
      Returns:
      Returns hoursList ObservableList.

    • setHoursList

      public static void setHoursList()
      Method that sets hoursList. Hours are between business's operating hours (8am - 10pm EST) converted to local time.

    • getMinutesList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getMinutesList()
      Method that returns minutesList.
      Returns:
      Returns minutesList ObservableList.

    • utcToLocal

      public static ZonedDateTime utcToLocal(ZonedDateTime dateUTC)
      Method that converts ZonedDateTime object from UTC to user's local time.
      Parameters:
      dateUTC - ZonedDateTime object to be converted.
      Returns:
      Returns local ZonedDateTime object.

    • estToLocal

      public static ZonedDateTime estToLocal(ZonedDateTime dateEST)
      Method that converts ZonedDateTime object from EST to user's local time.
      Parameters:
      dateEST - ZonedDateTime object to be converted.
      Returns:
      Returns local ZonedDateTime object.

    • stringToZDT

      public static ZonedDateTime stringToZDT(String dbDateTimeString)
      Method that converts String from database into ZonedDateTime object in UTC.
      Parameters:
      dbDateTimeString - DateTime String (from database).
      Returns:
      Returns UTC ZonedDateTime object.

    • dbStringToLocalString

      public static String dbStringToLocalString(String dbDateTimeString)
      Method that converts String from database, which was in UTC, into a String of the same format but displaying local time. This is done by first converting String from database into ZonedDateTime object, then making a UTC-to-local conversion, and finally converting back to a String.
      Parameters:
      dbDateTimeString - DateTime String (from database).
      Returns:
      Returns local date and time as String in same format.

    • zdtToString

      public static String zdtToString(ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Method that converts ZonedDateTime object into formatted String.
      Parameters:
      zdt - ZonedDateTime object to be converted.
      Returns:
      Returns formatted String.

    • userInputToZDT

      public static ZonedDateTime userInputToZDT(LocalDate localDate, int hour, String minuteString)
      Method that converts DateTime date, integer hour, and String minute from Appoinments form into a ZonedDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      localDate - LocalDate from DatePicker to be converted.
      hour - Integer hour from hour combo box to be converted.
      minuteString - String minute from minute combo box to be converted.
      Returns:
      Returns UTC ZonedDateTime object representing the LocalDate, hour and minute passed.

    • addHasOverlap

      public static boolean addHasOverlap(int customerId, ZonedDateTime checkStart, ZonedDateTime checkEnd)
      Method that determines whether there is an overlapping appointment for a given Customer on an add attempt.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID of customer to check current appointments for.
      checkStart - The starting date and time to check for overlap against.
      checkEnd - The ending date and time to check for overlap against.
      Returns:
      Returns true if an appointment conflict exists for a given customer, otherwise false.

    • updateHasOverlap

      public static boolean updateHasOverlap(int customerId, int appointmentId, ZonedDateTime checkStart, ZonedDateTime checkEnd)
      Method that determines whether there is an overlapping appointment for a given Customer on an update attempt.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Customer ID of customer to check current appointments for.
      appointmentId - Appointment ID of appointment being updated. This should not be considered when checking for conflicts.
      checkStart - The starting date and time to check for overlap against.
      checkEnd - The ending date and time to check for overlap against.
      Returns:
      Returns true if an appointment conflict exists for a given customer, otherwise false.

    • isOverlapping

      public static boolean isOverlapping(ZonedDateTime checkS, ZonedDateTime checkE, ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      Method that is the main logic for checking for date/time conflicts.
      Parameters:
      checkS - Starting ZonedDateTime object of date and time to be checked.
      checkE - Ending ZonedDateTime object of date and time to be checked.
      start - Already-scheduled starting ZonedDateTime we are checking against.
      end - Already-scheduled ending ZonedDateTime we are checking against.
      Returns:
      Returns true if an appointment conflict exists for a given customer, otherwise false.
